member.summary: Creates a new instance of the chrome driver.
member.param: Set chrome user profile directory. creates a temporary profile if userDataDir is null, and automatically deletes it after exiting.
Set chrome driver executable file path. (patches new binary)
Set browser executable file path. default using $PATH to execute.
Specifies to use the browser in headless mode. warning: This reduces undetectability and is not fully supported.
First launch using the welcome page.
The maximum amount of time to wait for each command. default value is 60 seconds.
Prefs is meant to store lightweight state that reflects user preferences. dict value can be value or json.
